text: can anyone verify that the background images render in outlook for d&d?  i dont see them in litmus
and my standard coded emails i do see them in litmus :thinking_face:
In your code, are you using VML to display the background images in Outlook? My thinking is here, HubSpot probably doesn't generate the VML necessary for the images to show in Outlook.
it looks like it is creating the vml.  i havent compared it to what i use, but there is some vml there
That may be the next step then, to compare and see if they're different. It's also possible that the images just didn't load in Litmus before the screenshot was taken. Sometimes it happens.
yeah.  but they have consistently not produced bg images.
